pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, March 9, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Berlin, Germany

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

10:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Platform 17 Memorial.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz.

Chancellery of Germany

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability with the Chancellor of Germany, Olaf Scholz.

Chancellery of Germany

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and participate in a question and answer session with members of Atlantik-Brücke and the Munich Security Conference.

Allianz Forum

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
